-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Decentralized, k-ordered unique ID generator.
--   
--   Clone of Boundary's Flake unique id service for Haskell, itself based
--   on Snowflake.
@package blacktip
@version 0.1.0.0

module Database.Blacktip.Types
data Config
Config :: Interface -> FilePath -> Milliseconds -> Config
interface :: Config -> Interface
timestampPath :: Config -> FilePath
allowableDowntime :: Config -> Milliseconds
data Interface
NIInterface :: NetworkInterface -> Interface
IName :: InterfaceName -> Interface
data ServerState
ServerState :: Milliseconds -> Sequence -> ServerState
ssTime :: ServerState -> Milliseconds
ssSequence :: ServerState -> Sequence
data ArrowOfTimeError
ArrowOfTimeError :: ArrowOfTimeError
data NoInterfaceError
NoInterfaceError :: NoInterfaceError
data ParseError
ParseError :: ParseError
data IdentityRecord
IdentityRecord :: Milliseconds -> MAC -> Sequence -> IdentityRecord
identityTime :: IdentityRecord -> Milliseconds
identityMac :: IdentityRecord -> MAC
identitySequence :: IdentityRecord -> Sequence
type InterfaceName = String
type Milliseconds = Int
type Sequence = Int16
type UniqueId = Integer
defaultConfig :: Config
instance Show Interface
instance Show Config
instance Show ServerState
instance Eq IdentityRecord
instance Ord IdentityRecord
instance Show IdentityRecord
instance Show ParseError
instance Show ArrowOfTimeError
instance Eq NoInterfaceError
instance Generic NoInterfaceError
instance Ord NoInterfaceError
instance Show NoInterfaceError
instance Datatype D1NoInterfaceError
instance Constructor C1_0NoInterfaceError
instance NFData NetworkInterface
instance NFData NoInterfaceError

module Database.Blacktip
generateUniqueId :: Config -> IO (Either NoInterfaceError UniqueId)
generateUniqueId' :: Config -> IO (Either NoInterfaceError (UniqueId, IdentityRecord))
getInterfaceByName :: InterfaceName -> IO (Maybe NetworkInterface)
getUnixMillis :: IO Milliseconds
integerToRecord :: Integer -> IdentityRecord
toBase62 :: Integer -> String
